remarks: Define implication in terms of 'nand'.  Analogous to ` ( ( ph -/\ ( ps -/\ ps ) ) <-> ( ph -> ps ) ) ` .  In a pure (standalone) treatment of Nicod's axiom, this theorem would be changed to a definition ($a statement).  (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2008.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
